field.name: aditionalGurantor
field.default: thiz.relationshipParty != null && thiz.relationshipParty.partyRole != null && thiz.relationshipParty.partyRole != null && (thiz.relationshipParty.partyRole.key == 'PARTY_ROLE_TYPE_GUARANTOR')

field.name: language
field.update: (isdef thiz) && (thiz == null || thiz.collateralStatement == null || thiz.collateralStatement.key == 'COLLATERAL_STATEMENT_TYPE_BLANKET_CUSTOM' || thiz.collateralStatement.key == 'COLLATERAL_STATEMENT_TYPE_EQUIPMENT_CUSTOM' || thiz.collateralStatement.key == 'COLLATERAL_STATEMENT_TYPE_A1_FIXTURE_FILING_CUSTOM' || thiz.collateralStatement.key == 'COLLATERAL_STATEMENT_TYPE_CUSTOM')
